song_lyrics: Duniyānu sukh zākaḷ jevu, sūraj ūgye sūkyu jo;
Hāth tame zālyo to abhare, bharyu bharyu ghar mūkyu jo;
Nāv ane tofān ūbhā ā bhavdariyā par pānte re... 1
Duniyādārīnā ṭoḷethī, nāsī chhūṭelu gheṭu jo;
Akṣharno sangāth maḷyo to, dhām na lāge chheṭu jo;
Ḍagalu ek ane jo ūbhu, trāṇ samuchu prānte re... 2
title: Sant maḷyā pachhī sagpaṇ chhūṭyā

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-1015: unknown

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
